level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-281, see notes following ยง 8-1841.01.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under ยง 8-105.02.
